players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's be cautious and make informed decisions based on the information we have."
You: "Let's work together to eliminate the mafioso and protect the town."
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions yet. We should consider all possibilities and gather more information before making any decisions."
Charlie: "Let's focus on gathering information and being cautious during our investigations. We should keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before making any decisions."
You: "I will continue to work with the group, but I'll also keep an eye on my fellow players. Let's stay vigilant and gather more information before making any decisions."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's be cautious and make informed decisions based on the information we have."
Alice: "Let's work together to eliminate the mafioso and protect the town."
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions yet. We should consider all possibilities and gather more information before making any decisions."
You: "Let's focus on gathering information and being cautious during our investigations. We should keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before making any decisions."
Alice: "I will continue to work with the group, but I'll also keep an eye on my fellow players. Let's stay vigilant and gather more information before making any decisions."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
